ing: 1 cup water, or more as needed
4 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped
des: "This luscious fruit smoothie is chock full of berries but has a definite spicy kick with the added fresh ginger. Very invigorating after a nice yoga workout!"
ins: Blend water, blueberries, strawberries, ginger, and agave nectar together in a blender until thick and smooth.
